rules.description: Amethyst: Right option + d to fullscreen
Amethyst: Right option + f to swap
Right Cmd + Right Opt to Ctrl
Change caps_lock to left_control if pressed with other keys, change caps_lock to escape if pressed alone.

manipulators.description: [Firefox] Use command+shift+n to open new private browsing window
[Apple Mail] Use command+shift+f to search across all mailboxes

rules.description: Amethyst: Right option + d to fullscreen
Amethyst: Right option + f to swap
Amethyst: Right option + t to toggle
Amethyst: Right option + g to cycle clockwise
Right Cmd + Right Opt to Ctrl
Change caps_lock to left_control if pressed with other keys, change caps_lock to escape if pressed alone.

manipulators.description: [Firefox] Use command+shift+n to open new private browsing window
[Apple Mail] Use command+shift+f to search across all mailboxes
